overview.en: CFun is a Dapp platform built on the globally publically avaliable ETH, aiming to becoming a supporting platform that unites global creators. With collaborative community creation fused with smart contracts to measure individual contribution, and complete transactions, realizing a socialized creative network and the generation and transfer of valuable digital assets.
overview.zh: CFun是一款搭建在全球公有链以太坊上的去中心化的移动应用，旨在成为全球创作者聚集的创作辅助平台，通过自组织的协同创作，结合智能合约计算创作贡献并完成交易等机制，实现社交化的众创内容生产及个人数字资产的价值传递。
